Receipt of suspicious emails containing.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for connections originating from internal hosts to external domains or IPs shortly after targeted users receive emails with keywords related to physical locations ('address', 'location', 'building', 'facility'). Analyze these connections for patterns indicative of accessing mapping services, public databases, or reconnaissance infrastructure.

Unusual process creation or file access.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) on endpoints, focusing on activities occurring shortly after the arrival of emails containing location-related keywords. Look for suspicious processes being launched or unusual access attempts to files or folders containing sensitive location or infrastructure documentation. Use time series analysis to identify anomalous event timing.
